description.value:
Shattered pieces of a glass mirror, formed into a reflective mosaic, comprise the irregular shaft of this wand. The handle is black and polished smooth, the pommel capped with a tiny reflective orb.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mirror Image]. Each time an image is destroyed, the image shatters into sharp fragments of glass. If the creature that destroyed the image is adjacent to you, it takes @Damage[5[slashing]].

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mirror Image]
